title: How to Recycle Just About Everything You Own

steps.headline: Clean out your garage, your house, or wherever it is you have stored your items.
If you have the room, and one assumes you do since you are 'cleaning', start separating it into groups; e.g.
steps.description: books, magazines, crafts, machinery, software, computers, etc.

steps.headline: Look on-line for various options for recycle (check sources).
Choose to join an online group like freecycle, it is as simple as posting what you have.
steps.description: Most of them are monitored because of spammers, but for most things you will find takers very quickly.

steps.headline: Think about how you can add value to stuff you normally throw away.

text: Clean out your garage, your house, or wherever it is you have stored your items.  If you have the room, and one assumes you do since you are 'cleaning', start separating it into groups; e.g. books, magazines, crafts, machinery, software, computers, etc. Look on-line for various options for recycle (check sources). There are a lot! Choose to join an online group like freecycle, it is as simple as posting what you have. Most of them are monitored because of spammers, but for most things you will find takers very quickly. Think about how you can add value to stuff you normally throw away.
